dcterms:creator: A. Alsaedi
N. Moustafa
Z. Tari
A. Mahmood
A. Anwar
dcterms:description: A dataset containing telemetry data from IoT and IIoT devices, designed for data-driven intrusion detection systems. It includes sensor readings and provides a baseline evaluation of various machine learning techniques.
dcterms:title: TON IoT Telemetry dataset

dcterms:description: A subset of the TON IoT dataset, specifically designed for training and testing purposes, containing sensor readings with timestamps.
dcterms:title: Train Test IoT dataset (TT dataset)

dcterms:description: A processed version of the TON IoT dataset, where the raw sensor data is converted into a structured format suitable for analysis.
dcterms:title: Processed IoT dataset (PR dataset)
